com.turn.ttorrent.tracker

Class Tracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.turn.ttorrent.tracker.Tracker

  • public class Tracker
extends Object
    BitTorrent tracker.

    The tracker usually listens on port 6969 (the standard BitTorrent tracker port). Torrents must be registered directly to this tracker with the announce(TrackedTorrent torrent) method.

    Author:
    mpetazzoni

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ANNOUNCE_URL
      Request path handled by the tracker announce request handler.
      static int DEFAULT_TRACKER_PORT
      Default tracker listening port (BitTorrent's default is 6969).
      static String DEFAULT_VERSION_STRING
      Default server name and version announced by the tracker.

      • Tracker

        public Tracker(InetAddress address)
        throws IOException
        Create a new BitTorrent tracker listening at the given address on the default port.
        Parameters:
        address - The address to bind to.
        Throws:
        IOException - Throws an IOException if the tracker cannot be initialized.

        public Tracker(InetSocketAddress address,
               String version)
        throws IOException
        Create a new BitTorrent tracker listening at the given address.
        Parameters:
        address - The address to bind to.
        version - A version string served in the HTTP headers
        Throws:
        IOException - Throws an IOException if the tracker cannot be initialized.

    • Method Detail

      • getAnnounceUrl

        public URL getAnnounceUrl()
        Returns the full announce URL served by this tracker.

        This has the form http://host:port/announce.

      • start

        public void start()
        Start the tracker thread.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop the tracker.

        This effectively closes the listening HTTP connection to terminate the service, and interrupts the peer collector thread as well.

      • getTrackedTorrents

        public Collection<TrackedTorrent> getTrackedTorrents()
        Returns the list of tracker's torrents

      • announce

        public TrackedTorrent announce(TrackedTorrent torrent)
        Announce a new torrent on this tracker.

        The fact that torrents must be announced here first makes this tracker a closed BitTorrent tracker: it will only accept clients for torrents it knows about, and this list of torrents is managed by the program instrumenting this Tracker class.

        Parameters:
        torrent - The Torrent object to start tracking.
        Returns:
        The torrent object for this torrent on this tracker. This may be different from the supplied Torrent object if the tracker already contained a torrent with the same hash.

      • remove

        public void remove(Torrent torrent)
        Stop announcing the given torrent.
        Parameters:
        torrent - The Torrent object to stop tracking.

      • remove

        public void remove(Torrent torrent,
                   long delay)
        Stop announcing the given torrent after a delay.
        Parameters:
        torrent - The Torrent object to stop tracking.
        delay - The delay, in milliseconds, before removing the torrent.
